Помойка, на которую вы потратите пол жизни, а потом поймёте, что это вам нахуй не надо...

Every player who plays counter strike meets cheaters almost every day, should he even play it at all? There are several platforms where anti-cheat is much better than in the steam game itself! Developers appeal to you. Will you ever take up anti-cheat? If so, the audience will be drawn to the game. And the community will finally raise the game from its knees! It's worth thinking about... And so the game is wonderful, for this and the evalution such.
Bad game compared to the budget they have but addictive as fuck
good game not for women B)

Far too many cheats to enjoy at a casual level in 2021, even with high trust factor.

Besides common dubious FPS activity like aimbots/wall hacks, users can crash official servers to disconnect you.
It has "global" in the name but you're only going to be playing with mexicans.
